title: Keto Tracker
subtitle: Track your ketogenic diet progress and stay motivated

calendar.title: Monthly Progress
calendar.clickToToggle: Click to cycle through: Success - Fasting - Cheat - Clear

settings.title: Keto Settings
settings.startDateLabel: When did you start your keto diet?
settings.targetDateDescription: When do you want to reach your goal?
settings.resetDescription: Delete all your keto tracking data and start fresh. This cannot be undone.
settings.resetConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete:

messages.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
messages.dataReset: All keto data has been reset.

progress.insightsSubtitle: Your keto journey overview and motivation
progress.streakMessage: Amazing! You're on a {streak} day streak. Every day counts toward your goals!
progress.journeyMessage: Every journey has its ups and downs. Today is a new opportunity to succeed!
progress.welcomeMessage: Welcome to your keto journey! Start by marking today's progress.

weight.title: Weight Tracking
weight.description: Track your weight progress over time
weight.noEntries: No weight entries yet. Start tracking your weight to see progress!

stages.title: Keto Stages
stages.noData: Start your keto journey to see your progress through the stages.

glycogen.name: Glycogen Depletion
glycogen.description: Your body is using up its stored glycogen (sugar) reserves. This is the beginning of your keto journey.

transition.name: Metabolic Transition
transition.description: Your metabolism is shifting from using glucose to fat as its primary fuel source. You may experience some adjustment symptoms.

ketosis.name: Nutritional Ketosis
ketosis.description: Congratulations! Your body is now primarily burning fat for fuel and producing ketones efficiently.

adaptation.name: Keto Adaptation
adaptation.description: Your body has become efficient at using fat and ketones for energy. Performance and well-being typically improve significantly.

mastery.name: Keto Mastery
mastery.description: You've achieved long-term metabolic flexibility. Your body efficiently switches between fuel sources and you've established sustainable habits.

household.title: Household Overview
household.description: See how everyone in your household is progressing
